articles.author: Chris Welch
articles.title: Sony Unveils $230 Clip-On Earbuds, Joining a Growing Wave - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: Sony Group Corp. introduced its latest pair of consumer earbuds, with a clip-on design that resembles recent efforts from Bose Corp., Lenovo Group Ltd.’s Motorola unit and Huawei Technologies Co.
articles.content:
